code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{BrowserRouter as Router,Routes,Route,Navigate}from'react-router-dom';import axios from'axios';import Login from'./components/Login';import StudentDashboard from'./components/StudentDashboard';import ForgotPassword from'./components/ForgotPassword';import FacultyDashboard from'./components/FacultyDashboard';import Navbar from'./components/Navbar';import'./styles.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[user,setUser]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const token=localStorage.getItem('token');if(token){axios.defaults.headers.common['Authorization']=`Bearer ${token}`;axios.get('http://localhost:5000/api/validate',{headers:{Authorization:`Bearer ${token}`}}).then(res=>{setUser(res.data.user);}).catch(()=>{localStorage.removeItem('token');setUser(null);});}},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Router,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"app",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navbar,{user:user,setUser:setUser}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"content",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Routes,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/",element:user?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navigate,{to:user.role==='student'?'/student':'/faculty'}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Login,{setUser:setUser})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/student",element:user&&user.role==='student'?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(StudentDashboard,{user:user}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navigate,{to:"/"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/faculty",element:user&&user.role==='faculty'?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FacultyDashboard,{user:user}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navigate,{to:"/"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/forgot-password",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ForgotPassword,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/register",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Register Page (To be implemented)"})})]})})]})});}export default App;
